thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Paris Elysees - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very handy.
thread.title_full: Very handy. - Review of Holiday Inn Paris Elysees, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Treeangel5
title: Very handy.
text:
We had 3 nights at the Holiday Inn and really enjoyed our stay there.
A bit of a pain to unload from the taxi as there is really no where to pull up except on the road.
But apart from that we did really enjoy this place.
It was within a small walk to most of the sights and Xmas markets.
The staff were great, and even though we ate out most of the time. The breakfast we had was very good, a great variety of foods.
There was a little corner store across the road and the man was lovely.
Also a pharmacy right outside the door if you needed.
Not sure if you had a car, where you would park.
And they had a unlimited supply of lolly pops, that we helped ourselves to every time we passed them.
It's also a 1min walk to the Presidents residence.
